trans-unit.source: Provides properties and instance methods for the creation, copying, deletion, moving, and opening of files, and aids in the creation of <see cref="T:System.IO.FileStream" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于创建、复制、删除、移动和打开文件的属性和实例方法，并且帮助创建 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileStream" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.FileInfo> class for typical operations such as copying, moving, renaming, creating, opening, deleting, and appending to files.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.FileInfo>类用于典型操作，如复制、 移动、 重命名、 创建、 打开、 删除和追加到文件。

trans-unit.source: If you are performing multiple operations on the same file, it can be more efficient to use <xref:System.IO.FileInfo> instance methods instead of the corresponding static methods of the <xref:System.IO.File> class, because a security check will not always be necessary.
trans-unit.target: 如果您正在执行同一个文件上的多个操作，它可以是使用更加高效<xref:System.IO.FileInfo>实例而不是静态方法的相应方法<xref:System.IO.File>类，因为安全检查不会总是有必要。

trans-unit.source: Many of the <xref:System.IO.FileInfo> methods return other I/O types when you create or open files.
trans-unit.target: 许多<xref:System.IO.FileInfo>方法返回其他 I/O 类型，创建或打开文件时。

trans-unit.source: You can use these other types to further manipulate a file.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用这些其他类型来进一步处理文件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see specific <xref:System.IO.FileInfo> members such as <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.Open%2A>, <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.OpenRead%2A>, <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.OpenText%2A>, <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.CreateText%2A>, or <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.Create%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅特定<xref:System.IO.FileInfo>成员，如<xref:System.IO.FileInfo.Open%2A>， <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.OpenRead%2A>， <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.OpenText%2A>， <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.CreateText%2A>，或<xref:System.IO.FileInfo.Create%2A>。

trans-unit.source: By default, full read/write access to new files is granted to all users.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，对新文件的完全读/写访问权限授予所有用户。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the enumerations that are used to customize the behavior of various <xref:System.IO.FileInfo> methods.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述了用于自定义的各种行为的枚举<xref:System.IO.FileInfo>方法。

trans-unit.source: Enumeration
trans-unit.target: 枚举

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Specifies read and write access to a file.
trans-unit.target: 指定读取和写入到文件的访问。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the level of access permitted for a file that is already in use.
trans-unit.target: 指定允许已在使用的文件的访问级别。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the contents of an existing file are preserved or overwritten, and whether requests to create an existing file cause an exception.
trans-unit.target: 指定现有文件的内容是保留还是覆盖，以及请求创建现有文件是否会导致异常。

trans-unit.source: In members that accept a path as an input string, that path must be well-formed or an exception is raised.
trans-unit.target: 在接受将路径作为输入字符串的成员，该路径必须是格式正确，或引发异常。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a path is fully qualified but begins with a space, the path is not trimmed in methods of the class.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果路径是完全限定的但以空格开始，在类的方法不修整路径。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the path is malformed and an exception is raised.
trans-unit.target: 因此，该路径格式不正确并且引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, a path or a combination of paths cannot be fully qualified twice.
trans-unit.target: 同样，路径或组合的路径不能完全限定两次。

trans-unit.source: For example, "c:\temp c:\windows" also raises an exception in most cases.
trans-unit.target: 例如，"c:\temp c:\windows"也会引发异常在大多数情况下。

trans-unit.source: Ensure that your paths are well-formed when using methods that accept a path string.
trans-unit.target: 确保使用接受将路径字符串的方法时，你的路径格式正确。

trans-unit.source: In members that accept a path, the path can refer to a file or just a directory.
trans-unit.target: 在接受路径的成员，路径可以引用一个文件或仅是目录。

trans-unit.source: The specified path can also refer to a relative path or a Universal Naming Convention (UNC) path for a server and share name.
trans-unit.target: 指定的路径也可以指相对路径或服务器和共享名称的通用命名约定 (UNC) 路径。

trans-unit.source: For example, all the following are acceptable paths:
trans-unit.target: 例如，以下所有条件都可接受的路径：

trans-unit.source: "c:\\\MyDir\\\MyFile.txt" in C#, or "c:\MyDir\MyFile.txt" in Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: "c:\\\MyDir\\\MyFile.txt"在 C# 或 Visual Basic 中的"c:\MyDir\MyFile.txt"。

trans-unit.source: "c:\\\MyDir" in C#, or "c:\MyDir" in Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: "c:\\\MyDir"在 C# 或 Visual Basic 中的"c:\MyDir"。

trans-unit.source: "MyDir\\\MySubdir" in C#, or "MyDir\MySubDir" in Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: "MyDir\\\MySubdir"在 C# 或 Visual Basic 中的"MyDir\MySubDir"。

trans-unit.source: "\\\\\\\MyServer\\\MyShare" in C#, or "\\\MyServer\MyShare" in Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: "\\\\\\\MyServer\\\MyShare"在 C# 中，或"\\\MyServer\MyShare"在 Visual Basic 中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.FileInfo> class provides the following properties that enable you to retrieve information about a file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileInfo>类提供的以下属性，使你能够检索有关文件的信息。

trans-unit.source: For an example of how to use each property, see the property pages.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何使用每个属性的示例，请参阅属性页。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.Directory%2A> property retrieves an object that represents the parent directory of a file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.Directory%2A>属性检索一个对象，表示文件的父目录。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.DirectoryName%2A> property retrieves the full path of the parent directory of a file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.DirectoryName%2A>属性检索文件的父目录的完整路径。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.Exists%2A> property checks for the presence of a file before operating on it.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.Exists%2A>属性在其上操作之前检查文件是否存在。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.IsReadOnly%2A> property retrieves or sets a value that specifies whether a file can be modified.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.IsReadOnly%2A>属性检索或设置一个值，指定是否可以修改一个文件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.Length%2A> retrieves the size of a file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.Length%2A>检索文件的大小。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.Name%2A> retrieves the name of a file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.Name%2A>检索文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates some of the main members of the `FileInfo` class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示的一些主要成员`FileInfo`类。

trans-unit.source: When the properties are first retrieved, <xref:System.IO.FileInfo> calls the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh%2A> method and caches information about the file.
trans-unit.target: 当第一次检索属性时，<xref:System.IO.FileInfo>调用<xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh%2A>文件的方法和缓存信息。

trans-unit.source: On subsequent calls, you must call <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh%2A> to get the latest copy of the information.
trans-unit.target: 在后续调用中，必须调用<xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh%2A>以获取信息的最新副本。

trans-unit.source: This example produces output similar to the following.
trans-unit.target: 此示例生成类似于下面的输出。

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified name of the new file, or the relative file name.
trans-unit.target: 新文件的完全限定名或相对文件名。

trans-unit.source: Do not end the path with the directory separator character.
trans-unit.target: 路径不要以目录分隔符结尾。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IO.FileInfo" /> class, which acts as a wrapper for a file path.
trans-unit.target: 初始化作为文件路径的包装的 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileInfo" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: You can specify either the fully qualified or the relative file name, but the security check gets the fully qualified name.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定完全限定或相对文件名，但安全检查获取完全限定的名称。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses this constructor to create two files, which are then written to, read from, copied, and deleted.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用此构造函数来创建两个文件，然后再写入、 读取、 复制，并删除。

trans-unit.target: 调用方没有所要求的权限。

trans-unit.target: 文件名为空，仅包含空格，或包含无效字符。

trans-unit.target: 指定的路径和/或文件名超过了系统定义的最大长度。

trans-unit.source: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must be less than 248 characters, and file names must be less than 260 characters.

trans-unit.target: 用于读取和追加到文件。

trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />， <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Append" />

trans-unit.source: Copies an existing file to a new file.
trans-unit.target: 将现有文件复制到新文件。

trans-unit.source: The name of the new file to copy to.
trans-unit.target: 要复制到的新文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: Copies an existing file to a new file, disallowing the overwriting of an existing file.
trans-unit.target: 将现有文件复制到新文件，不允许覆盖现有文件。

trans-unit.source: A new file with a fully qualified path.
trans-unit.target: 带有完全限定路径的新文件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.CopyTo%2A> method to allow overwriting of an existing file.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.FileInfo.CopyTo%2A>方法，以便允许覆盖现有文件。

trans-unit.source: Whenever possible, avoid using short file names (such as XXXXXX~1.XXX) with this method.
trans-unit.target: 只要有可能，避免在使用此方法 （如 XXXXXX~1.XXX) 的短文件名。

trans-unit.source: If two files have equivalent short file names then this method may fail and raise an exception and/or result in undesirable behavior
trans-unit.target: 如果两个文件都有等效项短文件名，则此方法可能失败并引发异常和/或导致意外行为

trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何将一个文件复制到另一个文件，如果目标文件已存在，则引发异常。

trans-unit.source: for reading and writing files.
trans-unit.target: 用于读取和写入文件。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Write" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />， <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Write" />

trans-unit.source: The name of the new file to copy to.
trans-unit.target: 要复制到的新文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to allow an existing file to be overwritten; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若为 <see langword="true" />，则允许覆盖现有文件；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Copies an existing file to a new file, allowing the overwriting of an existing file.
trans-unit.target: 将现有文件复制到新文件，允许覆盖现有文件。

trans-unit.source: A new file, or an overwrite of an existing file if <paramref name="overwrite" /> is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 为新文件；如果 <paramref name="overwrite" /> 是 <see langword="true" />，则为现有文件的覆盖。

trans-unit.source: If the file exists and <paramref name="overwrite" /> is <see langword="false" />, an <see cref="T:System.IO.IOException" /> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果文件存在且 <paramref name="overwrite" /> 为 <see langword="false" />，则引发 <see cref="T:System.IO.IOException" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to allow or prevent overwriting of an existing file.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法允许或阻止覆盖现有文件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.CopyTo%2A> method to prevent overwriting of an existing file by default.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.FileInfo.CopyTo%2A>方法，以防止覆盖现有文件的默认情况下。

trans-unit.source: Whenever possible, avoid using short file names (such as XXXXXX~1.XXX) with this method.

trans-unit.target: 如果两个文件都有等效项短文件名，则此方法可能失败并引发异常和/或导致意外行为

trans-unit.source: Decrypts a file that was encrypted by the current account using the <see cref="M:System.IO.FileInfo.Encrypt" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="M:System.IO.FileInfo.Encrypt" /> 方法解密由当前帐户加密的文件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.Decrypt%2A> method allows you to decrypt a file that was encrypted using the <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.Encrypt%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.Decrypt%2A>方法允许你使用加密文件进行解密<xref:System.IO.FileInfo.Encrypt%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.Decrypt%2A> method can decrypt only files that were encrypted using the current user account.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.Decrypt%2A>方法可以解密使用当前用户帐户加密的文件。

trans-unit.source: Both the <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.Encrypt%2A> method and the <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.Decrypt%2A> method use the cryptographic service provider (CSP) installed on the computer and the file encryption keys of the process calling the method.
trans-unit.target: 这两个<xref:System.IO.FileInfo.Encrypt%2A>方法和<xref:System.IO.FileInfo.Decrypt%2A>方法使用安装在计算机和调用方法的过程的文件加密密钥的加密服务提供程序 (CSP)。

trans-unit.source: The current file system must be formatted as NTFS and the current operating system must be Microsoft Windows NT or later.
trans-unit.target: 当前的文件系统必须格式化为 NTFS 和当前的操作系统必须是 Microsoft Windows NT 或更高版本。

trans-unit.source: On subsequent calls, you must call <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh%2A> to get the latest copy of the information.
trans-unit.target: 在后续调用中，必须调用<xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh%2A>以获取信息的最新副本。

trans-unit.source: Encrypts a file so that only the account used to encrypt the file can decrypt it.
trans-unit.target: 将某个文件加密，使得只有加密该文件的帐户才能将其解密。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.Encrypt%2A> method allows you to encrypt a file so that only the account used to call this method can decrypt it.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.Encrypt%2A>方法可用于加密文件，以便仅用来调用此方法的帐户可以对其进行解密。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.Decrypt%2A> method to decrypt a file encrypted by the <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.Encrypt%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.FileInfo.Decrypt%2A>方法以解密加密的文件<xref:System.IO.FileInfo.Encrypt%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Both the <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.Encrypt%2A> method and the <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.Decrypt%2A> method use the cryptographic service provider (CSP) installed on the computer and the file encryption keys of the process calling the method.
trans-unit.target: 这两个<xref:System.IO.FileInfo.Encrypt%2A>方法和<xref:System.IO.FileInfo.Decrypt%2A>方法使用安装在计算机和调用方法的过程的文件加密密钥的加密服务提供程序 (CSP)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether a file exists.
trans-unit.target: 获取指示文件是否存在的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the file exists; <see langword="false" /> if the file does not exist or if the file is a directory.
trans-unit.target: 如果该文件存在，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果文件不存在或文件即是目录，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When first called, <xref:System.IO.FileInfo> calls <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh%2A> and caches information about the file.
trans-unit.target: 当第一次调用，<xref:System.IO.FileInfo>调用<xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh%2A>和缓存文件的信息。

trans-unit.source: On subsequent calls, you must call <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh%2A> to get the latest copy of the information.
trans-unit.target: 在后续调用中，必须调用<xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh%2A>以获取信息的最新副本。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.Exists%2A> property returns `false` if any error occurs while trying to determine if the specified file exists.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.Exists%2A>属性返回`false`如果在尝试确定指定的文件是否存在任何错误时发生。

trans-unit.source: This can occur in situations that raise exceptions such as passing a file name with invalid characters or too many characters, a failing or missing disk, or if the caller does not have permission to read the file.
trans-unit.target: 在引发异常，例如传递具有无效的字符或太多字符，磁盘失效或缺失的文件名的情况下可能发生这或如果调用方没有权限读取此文件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.Exists%2A> property ensure a file exists before opening it.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.IO.FileInfo.Exists%2A>属性确保在打开之前存在的文件。

trans-unit.source: You can use this technique to throw a custom exception when the file is not found.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可用于引发自定义异常，找不到文件时。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity" /> object that encapsulates the access control list (ACL) entries for the file described by the current <see cref="T:System.IO.FileInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity" /> 对象，该对象封装当前 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileInfo" /> 对象所描述的文件的访问控制列表 (ACL) 项。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.GetAccessControl%2A> methods to retrieve the access control list (ACL) entries for the current file.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.FileInfo.GetAccessControl%2A>方法来检索访问控制的当前文件的列表 (ACL) 项。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity" /> object that encapsulates the access control list (ACL) entries for the file described by the current <see cref="T:System.IO.FileInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity" /> 对象，该对象封装当前 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileInfo" /> 对象所描述的文件的访问控制列表 (ACL) 项。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity" /> object that encapsulates the access control rules for the current file.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity" /> 对象，该对象封装当前文件的访问控制规则。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.GetAccessControl%2A> method to retrieve the access control list (ACL) entries for the current file.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.FileInfo.GetAccessControl%2A>方法来检索当前文件的访问控制列表 (ACL) 项。

trans-unit.source: An ACL describes individuals and/or groups who have, or do not have, rights to specific actions on the given file.
trans-unit.target: ACL 描述个人和/或组具有或没有执行到给定的文件上的特定操作的权限。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Add or Remove Access Control List Entries](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-add-or-remove-access-control-list-entries.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：添加或移除访问控制列表项](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-add-or-remove-access-control-list-entries.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.GetAccessControl%2A> method and the <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.SetAccessControl%2A> method to add and then remove an access control list (ACL) entry from a file.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.IO.FileInfo.GetAccessControl%2A>方法和<xref:System.IO.FileInfo.SetAccessControl%2A>方法添加，然后从文件中删除的访问控制列表 (ACL) 项。

trans-unit.source: When first called, <xref:System.IO.FileInfo> calls <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh%2A> and caches information about the file.
trans-unit.target: 当第一次调用，<xref:System.IO.FileInfo>调用<xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh%2A>和缓存文件的信息。

trans-unit.source: On subsequent calls, you must call <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh%2A> to get the latest copy of the information.
trans-unit.target: 在后续调用中，必须调用<xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh%2A>以获取信息的最新副本。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.OpenWrite%2A> method opens a file if one already exists for the file path, or creates a new file if one does not exist.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.OpenWrite%2A>方法打开一个文件，如果一个已存在的文件路径，或创建一个新文件，如果不存在。

trans-unit.source: For an existing file, it does not append the new text to the existing text.
trans-unit.target: 对于现有的文件，它不会不新将文本追加到现有的文本。

trans-unit.source: Instead, it overwrites the existing characters with the new characters.
trans-unit.target: 相反，它将用新的字符覆盖现有的字符。

trans-unit.source: If you overwrite a longer string (such as "This is a test of the OpenWrite method") with a shorter string (like "Second run"), the file will contain a mix of the strings ("Second runtest of the OpenWrite method").
trans-unit.target: 如果使用较短字符串 （如"第二次运行"） （例如"This is OpenWrite 方法的测试)"覆盖较长的字符串，则文件将包含多种字符串 ("第二个 runtest OpenWrite 方法的")。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.Replace%2A>方法会指定文件的内容替换为当前所描述的文件的内容<xref:System.IO.FileInfo>对象。

trans-unit.source: It also creates a backup of the file that was replaced.
trans-unit.target: 它还将创建被替换文件的备份。

trans-unit.source: Finally, it returns a new <xref:System.IO.FileInfo> object that describes the overwritten file.
trans-unit.target: 最后，它返回一个新<xref:System.IO.FileInfo>对象，描述被覆盖的文件。

trans-unit.source: This method will succeed in Windows 2000 environments if the `destFileName` is read-only and will not raise an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法将在 Windows 2000 环境中成功`destFileName`是只读的并且不会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.IsReadOnly%2A> property to check if the destination file is read-only before attempting to replace it.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.FileInfo.IsReadOnly%2A>属性检查目标文件然后再尝试将其替换中是否为只读的。

trans-unit.source: Pass `null` to the `destBackupFileName` parameter if you do not want to create a backup of the file being replaced.
trans-unit.target: 传递`null`到`destBackupFileName`参数，如果你不想要创建被替换文件的备份。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.IO.File.Replace%2A> method to replace a file with another file and create a backup of the replaced file.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.IO.File.Replace%2A>方法将替换为另一个文件的文件并创建被替换文件的备份。

trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="destBackupFileName" /> 参数描述的路径格式不合法。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="destFileName" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 找不到当前 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileInfo" /> 对象描述的文件。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.target: 找不到 <paramref name="destinationFileName" /> 参数描述的文件。

trans-unit.source: The current operating system is not Microsoft Windows NT or later.
trans-unit.target: 当前操作系统不是 Microsoft Windows NT 或更高版本。

trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Write" />

trans-unit.source: Security Action: Demand.
trans-unit.target: 安全操作： 需。

trans-unit.source: For permission to write to file described by the <paramref name="destBackupFileName" /> parameter if one is specified.
trans-unit.target: 要写入的权限所描述的文件<paramref name="destBackupFileName" />如果指定的参数。

trans-unit.source: The name of a file to replace with the current file.
trans-unit.target: 要替换为当前文件的文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of a file with which to create a backup of the file described by the <c>destFileName</c> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 文件的名称，该文件用于创建 <c>destFileName</c> 参数所描述的文件的备份。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to ignore merge errors (such as attributes and ACLs) from the replaced file to the replacement file; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要忽略从被替换文件到替换文件的合并错误（例如属性和 ACL），请设置为 <see langword="true" />；否则设置为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Replaces the contents of a specified file with the file described by the current <see cref="T:System.IO.FileInfo" /> object, deleting the original file, and creating a backup of the replaced file.
trans-unit.target: 使用当前 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileInfo" /> 对象所描述的文件替换指定文件的内容，这一过程将删除原始文件，并创建被替换文件的备份。

trans-unit.source: Also specifies whether to ignore merge errors.
trans-unit.target: 还指定是否忽略合并错误。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.FileInfo" /> object that encapsulates information about the file described by the <paramref name="destFileName" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileInfo" /> 对象，该对象封装有关 <paramref name="destFileName" /> 参数所描述的文件的信息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.Replace%2A> method replaces the contents of a specified file with the contents of the file described by the current <xref:System.IO.FileInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.Replace%2A>方法会指定文件的内容替换为当前所描述的文件的内容<xref:System.IO.FileInfo>对象。

trans-unit.source: It also creates a backup of the file that was replaced.
trans-unit.target: 它还将创建被替换文件的备份。

trans-unit.source: Finally, it returns a new <xref:System.IO.FileInfo> object that describes the overwritten file.
trans-unit.target: 最后，它返回一个新<xref:System.IO.FileInfo>对象，描述被覆盖的文件。

trans-unit.source: This method will succeed in Windows 2000 environments if the `destFileName` is read-only and will not raise an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法将在 Windows 2000 环境中成功`destFileName`是只读的并且不会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.IsReadOnly%2A> property to check if the destination file is read-only before attempting to replace it.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.FileInfo.IsReadOnly%2A>属性检查目标文件然后再尝试将其替换中是否为只读的。

trans-unit.source: Pass `null` to the `destBackupFileName` parameter if you do not want to create a backup of the file being replaced.
trans-unit.target: 传递`null`到`destBackupFileName`参数，如果你不想要创建被替换文件的备份。

trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.IO.File.Replace%2A>方法将替换为另一个文件的文件并创建被替换文件的备份。

trans-unit.target: 当前操作系统不是 Microsoft Windows NT 或更高版本。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Write" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Write" />

trans-unit.source: Security Action: Demand.
trans-unit.target: 安全操作： 需。

trans-unit.source: For permission to write to file described by the <paramref name="destBackupFileName" /> parameter if one is specified.
trans-unit.target: 要写入的权限所描述的文件<paramref name="destBackupFileName" />如果指定的参数。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity" /> object that describes an access control list (ACL) entry to apply to the current file.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity" /> 对象，该对象描述要应用于当前文件的访问控制列表 (ACL) 项。

trans-unit.source: Applies access control list (ACL) entries described by a <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity" /> object to the file described by the current <see cref="T:System.IO.FileInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity" /> 对象所描述的访问控制列表 (ACL) 项应用于当前 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileInfo" /> 对象所描述的文件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.SetAccessControl%2A> method applies access control list (ACL) entries to the current file that represents the noninherited ACL list.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.SetAccessControl%2A>方法适用于表示非继承的 ACL 列表的当前文件的访问控制列表 (ACL) 项。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.SetAccessControl%2A> method whenever you need to add or remove ACL entries from a file.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.FileInfo.SetAccessControl%2A>方法，无论何时需要添加或删除文件的 ACL 条目。

trans-unit.source: The ACL specified for the `fileSecurity` parameter replaces the existing ACL for the file.
trans-unit.target: 为 ACL 指定`fileSecurity`参数替换现有文件 ACL。

trans-unit.source: To add permissions for a new user, use the <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetAccessControl%2A> method to obtain the existing ACL, modify it, and then use <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.SetAccessControl%2A> to apply it back to the file.
trans-unit.target: 若要添加的新用户的权限，请使用<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetAccessControl%2A>方法来获取现有的 ACL，对其进行修改，然后使用<xref:System.IO.FileInfo.SetAccessControl%2A>以将其应用回的文件。

trans-unit.source: An ACL describes individuals and/or groups who have, or do not have, rights to specific actions on the given file.
trans-unit.target: ACL 描述个人和/或组具有或没有执行到给定的文件上的特定操作的权限。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Add or Remove Access Control List Entries](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-add-or-remove-access-control-list-entries.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：添加或移除访问控制列表项](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-add-or-remove-access-control-list-entries.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.SetAccessControl%2A> method persists only <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> objects that have been modified after object creation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.SetAccessControl%2A>方法仍然仅存在<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>对象创建后已修改的对象。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> object has not been modified, it will not be persisted to a file.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>尚未修改对象，它不会保留到文件。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, it is not possible to retrieve a <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> object from one file and reapply the same object to another file.
trans-unit.target: 因此，不能检索<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>对象从一个文件，并重新对同一对象应用到另一个文件。

trans-unit.source: To copy ACL information from one file to another:
trans-unit.target: 若要将 ACL 信息从一个文件复制到另一个：

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.GetAccessControl%2A> method to retrieve the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> object from the source file.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.FileInfo.GetAccessControl%2A>方法来检索<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>源文件中的对象。

trans-unit.source: Create a new <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> object for the destination file.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>目标文件的对象。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.GetSecurityDescriptorBinaryForm%2A> or <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.GetSecurityDescriptorSddlForm%2A> method of the source <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> object to retrieve the ACL information.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.GetSecurityDescriptorBinaryForm%2A>或<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.GetSecurityDescriptorSddlForm%2A>方法的源<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>要检索 ACL 信息对象。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.SetSecurityDescriptorBinaryForm%2A> or <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.SetSecurityDescriptorSddlForm%2A> method to copy the information retrieved in step 3 to the destination <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.SetSecurityDescriptorBinaryForm%2A>或<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.SetSecurityDescriptorSddlForm%2A>方法的信息复制到目标的步骤 3 中检索<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>对象。

trans-unit.source: Set the destination <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> object to the destination file using the <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.SetAccessControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 设置目标<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>到目标文件使用的对象<xref:System.IO.FileInfo.SetAccessControl%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.GetAccessControl%2A> method and the <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.SetAccessControl%2A> method to add and then remove an ACL entry from a file.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.IO.FileInfo.GetAccessControl%2A>方法和<xref:System.IO.FileInfo.SetAccessControl%2A>方法添加，然后从文件中删除的 ACL 项。

trans-unit.source: You must supply a valid user or group account to run this example.
trans-unit.target: 你必须提供有效的用户或组帐户以运行此示例。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="fileSecurity" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="fileSecurity" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The file could not be found or modified.
trans-unit.target: 未能找到或修改该文件。

trans-unit.source: The current process does not have access to open the file.
trans-unit.target: 当前进程不具有打开该文件的权限。

trans-unit.source: The current operating system is not Microsoft Windows 2000 or later.
trans-unit.target: 当前操作系统不是 Microsoft Windows 2000 或更高版本。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.NoAccess" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlActions.Change" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.NoAccess" />， <see cref="F:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlActions.Change" />

trans-unit.source: Security Action: Demand
trans-unit.target: 安全操作： 需

trans-unit.source: For permission to access the file.
trans-unit.target: 若要访问该文件的权限。

trans-unit.source: Returns the path as a string.
trans-unit.target: 以字符串形式返回路径。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the path.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示该路径的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The string returned by the <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.ToString%2A> method represents path that was passed to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 返回的字符串<xref:System.IO.FileInfo.ToString%2A>方法表示传递给构造函数的路径。

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.IO.FileInfo> object using the constructors, the <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.ToString%2A> method returns the fully qualified path.
trans-unit.target: 当你创建<xref:System.IO.FileInfo>对象使用构造函数，<xref:System.IO.FileInfo.ToString%2A>方法返回的完全限定的路径。

trans-unit.source: However, there are cases where the string returned by the <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.ToString%2A> method does not represent the fully qualified path.
trans-unit.target: 但是，也会通过返回的字符串的情况<xref:System.IO.FileInfo.ToString%2A>方法不表示的完全限定的路径。

trans-unit.source: For example, when you create a <xref:System.IO.FileInfo> object using the <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFiles%2A> method, the <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.ToString%2A> method does not represent the fully qualified path.
trans-unit.target: 例如，当创建<xref:System.IO.FileInfo>对象使用<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFiles%2A>方法，<xref:System.IO.FileInfo.ToString%2A>方法不表示的完全限定的路径。
